Economics and Finance before 2019.electives description: Six courses to be chosen from 200-level of higher BUS, EC, FIN, LAW, MA, MGT, MKT, PL or PS courses. At least three course must be 300-level EC or FIN courses.

Business Administration.electives description: Four courses at the 300-level or higher to be chosen from: BUS, EC, FIN, LAW, MGT, MKT courses, MA209, MA299 and 400-level MA courses

International Business.electives description: Four courses at the 300-level or higher to be chosen from: BUS, EC, FIN, LAW, MGT, MKT courses

Economics and Finance.electives description: Five courses to be chosen from 300/400-level courses in EC or FIN, MA 299, or 300/400-level MA courses, or 200/300-level CS courses. No more than two courses from the previous list could be substituted by 200/300-level courses from BUS, LAW, MGT, MKT, PL, PS, SOS courses.
